title: where to find free chinese fonts
content:
hi all

i am new to this forum and i need some help..

i am looking for some funky chinese fonts (not those standard ones from chinesestar software) and also some handwriting fonts. i did do a search through yahoo or google but seems not able to find a site that has free fonts. kindly help me and thanks in advance.

/sb
author: seasonalblue

comments.content: If you are looking for free fonts, you are not likely to receive a lot of cooperation here: I suggest you refine your Google search, and keep plugging away. Even free stuff costs something, if only a little effort.

roman letters with campy stereotypical flair?  
or actual chinese fonts?  
i wasn't sure what exactly you're looking for.

hi paul

thanks for replying.

i am looking for actual chinese fonts but more fun types. hope you get what i mean.

/sb

Hi,

you can go to Luc Devroye's page, he has compiled a list (propably the ultimate list) of commercial and non-comercial font suppliers for chinese fonts:

[http://cg.scs.carleton.ca/~luc/china.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20100131133614/http:/cg.scs.carleton.ca/~luc/china.html "http://cg.scs.carleton.ca/~luc/china.html")

(he has lists like that for other languages as well.)

---  
JH, London
